title: Mindfulness Beginner
information:
The goal of the Mindfulness Beginner Course is to help you practice mindfulness in your daily life.

For the next 7 days we will send you exercises to bring your attention back to the present.

This course recognizes that learning to be mindful takes daily practice. For best results, we recommend doing the exercises throughout your day instead of all at once. We will send you spaced out reminders to help you succeed in this.

If you have any feedback please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out. We are continually developing additional courses and adjusting our existing offerings based on feedback from people like you.

Please enjoy!

exercises.title: First Step
exercises.copy: Mindfulness Beginner Course
exercises.instructions:
This 7 day course will help you practice mindfulness by sending you daily exercises.

Good luck in your practice.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Take a few deep breaths then close your eyes and place your attention on your ribcage expanding and contracting as you breathe.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and take a few deep breaths. Feel the sensations in the bottom of your feet.

exercises.title: See
exercises.copy: Unfocus your eyes and notice everything that is green and blue in your environment.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and take a few deep breaths Place your attention on your hands. Feel the sensations there.

exercises.title: Hear
exercises.copy: Choose a repetitive sound in your environment. Close your eyes. Focus on the sound.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and count the next 5 breaths mentally. Keep your attention on your breath.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. What are you feeling in your torso? Pay close attention to the sensations there.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Concentrate on your breath. Feel the sensation in your nostrils as you breathe through your nose for 5 breaths.

exercises.title: See
exercises.copy: Lower your gaze, unfocus your eyes and pay attention to your entire visual field.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and focus on your breath. Count each you take.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. What are you feeling in your forehead? Pay close attention to the sensations there.

exercises.title: Hear
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and listen to all the sounds around you.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Breathe very slowly and deeply with each breath.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. Start from your feet and move your attention through your body. Pause for a breath at your knees, groin, stomach, chest, neck, and head.

exercises.title: Hear
exercises.copy: Listen for the next "new" sound in your environment.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and focus intensely on the feeling of your lungs expanding and deflating as you breathe.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. What are you feeling in your eyes? Pay close attention to the sensations there.

exercises.title: Hear
exercises.copy: Rest your awareness on your ears. Keep your attention there as sounds come and go.

exercises.title: Last Day
exercises.copy: Mindfulness Beginner Complete
exercises.instructions:
Thank you for practicing with us. If you enjoyed the course please give us a 5 star rating on the app store. This goes a long way in helping us reach more people.

There will be more content coming soon.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Concentrate on your breath. Feel the sensation in your nostrils as you breathe through your nose.

exercises.title: Sensation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and feel the entire surface of your back.

exercises.title: Breath
exercises.copy: Without adjusting anything, simply notice the natural rhythm of your breath.
